description: Enterprise techniques used by Scarlet Mimic, ATT&CK group G0029 v1.2
name: Scarlet Mimic (G0029)

techniques.comment: [Scarlet Mimic](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0029) has used the left-to-right override character in self-extracting RAR archive spearphishing attachment file names.(Citation: Scarlet Mimic Jan 2016)
